reviewText: Great young SRK movie. Not quite as good as Anjaam, but better than Karan-Arjun, at least in my opinion. Great story of three brothers, with excellent acting by Jackie Shroff, Anil Kappor and Shah Rukh with all the melodrama you expect of a film with evil men worshiping Durga.  I really enjoyed it, but it won't be for everyone.
Great movie, sadly company did not state that it was coded for region that would not play in a US DVD player
waited twenty years to get this and was not disappointed
If you are a Shah Rukh Khan film, this is a good film to have. I loved the three brothers in the story. The villian is a bit much. But, I'm glad to have the film.
